Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh, Commandant. Good afternoon. Is something the matter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you about to leave for military supplies?', 3: '6', 4: 'Anything I can help with?', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh—yup. Today's Thursday after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's okay, Commandant. You should take a rest. I can handle the supplies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Let me do it.', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Huh...? But, that's part of my duties...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Get some rest, Liv.', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'W-was I messing it up before...? Did I do something wrong?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course not!', 3: '14'}
{3: 'After an eternity, you finally convince Liv that you just want to help out, and that it is not an issue on her end.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...Then, I'll leave it to you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leave this to me!', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't know what drove you to do this, Commandant... But thanks!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory84.jpg'}
{3: 'Learning from before, you pick up the military supplies without a hitch this time. You quickly scan the hall afterward.'}
{3: '...And you find her. Vera is in that same corner again, but this time, she seems to be conversing with a different person.'}
{3: "Vera's thin lips move. The man in front of her deflates visibly, just like the last. He hands her a... medication vial?"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...And here I was. Trying to pretend I didn't see you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man pauses and speaks something to Vera. She sighs.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hello? Do you need a new pair of ears?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera extends her hand and gestures, as if beckoning a small animal toward her. You are still unsure if she is referring to you, but you walk over anyway.'}
{3: 'She then points at you, saying something inaudible to the man. The man nods and hands a black trunk to Vera.'}
{3: 'The man, likely some supplier, writes something down on a notebook.'}
{3: 'You see some nigh-unintelligible scribbles... and some unfamiliar words, and... your name...?'}
{3: 'You tell yourself not to look, but you still accidentally catch several unfamiliar words on the pages.'}
{2: 'Supplier', 3: 'Alrighty.'}
{3: 'Vera hums in delight. She grabs your arm before you could even react, then drags you outside.'}
{2: 'What was that?', 3: '44', 4: "What's the matter?", 5: '44'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Just used your name for a little trade. That's all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You used my name?', 3: '48', 4: 'What trade?', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Exactly what you think it is. Smuggling medical supplies. How\'s that sound? Want a piece, "pardner?"', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Course I know it's illegal. Now that you're in on this, try saying no. You'll find yourself in the gutters in the morning.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Uh-huh. Now that you know. You only have one option left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just smuggling some medical supplies. Not much of a big deal. How\'s that sound? Want a piece, "pardner?"', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Too late. We're already a couple of criminals.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Uh-huh. Now that you know. You only have one option left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But, well. Thanks to your rep, the guy bowed down and agreed to a lower price.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Now that we're on the same boat though, I don't mind tellin' you a little something more.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why are you doing this?', 3: '59', 4: 'Why smuggle?', 5: '63'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'All the better to complete missions with, dear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "On the battlefield, I'm always the last one standing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't expect the other mongrels to be at my level. So to stop them from dragging me down, I'll have to make preparations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If I can just stroll into meds and grab these juicers, I won't be doing this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What are you? Just naive? Or dumb?', 4: '1'}
{2: "So you're trafficking drugs?", 3: '66'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "No. Just messin' with you.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: '69', 4: 'What are you actually doing?', 5: '69'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Pah. Truth is, you're one annoying wimp. What I'm doing is none of your business.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Didn't I tell you to stop poking your nose into things?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'And even so, you\'re still sniffing around my personal life. You might need a better whipping, "Commandant."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Go ahead, try bothering me again. But don't come crying because of what I'll do to you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The red-haired vixen gloats at the expression you make.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What a face you pull! The Gray Ravens should get a picture of this and hang it over at their base.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Anyways, what happened here, stays here. Cerberus has nothing to fear. You though, might want to watch out.', 4: '1'}
